; ;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176582; ;-1; ;氨气能否中和干燥非极性介质中的胺盐酸盐</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="organic-chemistry" >;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="amines">;</category>; <author>; <name>;实体</name>; <uri>;https:// /chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/53682</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176582/does-ammonia-gas-neutralise-hcl-salt-of -amines-in-dry-non-polar-medium" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-30T14:35:27Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-30T15:44:22Z</ Updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我正在尝试通过悬浮在非极性物质中的盐柱鼓泡干燥（或半干燥）氨气来碱化/中和胺和其他有机化合物的HCl盐甲苯或二甲苯等溶剂。</p>; <p>;由于几乎没有水存在，氨气能够与 HCl 反应形成氯化铵。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <条目>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176581</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-2</re:rank>; <标题type="text">;如何计算出口流中的浓度和反应器体积？请帮忙！</stitle>; <updated>;2023-09-30T13:32:42Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我正在尝试解决以下问题，我提供了截图。</p>; <p>;我通过乙烷进料（27 吨/小时）除以其摩尔质量（30.07 克/摩尔）计算出 A 的摩尔流量，正确答案是 249,418 摩尔/秒.</p>; <p>;我还用阿伦尼乌斯方程正确计算了反应速率常数，结果是 13,232 s^-1。</p>; <p>;我还有两件事遇到麻烦。</p>; < ol>; <li>;我不知道如何计算出口流中 A 的浓度。</li>; <li>;反应器体积（立方米）。</li>; </ol>; <p>;请有人帮忙我，提前谢谢你！</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/VMSdA.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https:// /i.stack.imgur.com/VMSdA.png" alt="在此处输入图像描述" />;</a>;</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry .stackexchange.com/q/176580</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;有机溶剂的安全性在密封压力罐或真空室中</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="solvents">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry. stackexchange.com/tags" term="vapor-压强">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term=" Plastics">;</category>; <作者>; <姓名>;尼克·佩里</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138029</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176580/密封压力锅或真空室中有机溶剂的安全性" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-09-30T08:49:53Z</已发布>; <更新>;2023-09-30T08:49:53Z</更新>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我正在尝试尝试并找到可以在家里重复使用各种类型的热塑性塑料用于业余爱好的方法，并研究了各种它们在溶剂（室温或其他温度）中的溶解度，以在模具中进行重铸实验。含有聚苯乙烯的混合物的一个常见问题类似于热固性树脂的铸造，滞留的气泡（甚至滞留的溶剂气泡）导致铸件出现凹坑。因此，我正在考虑是否可以在铸造期间或之前使用真空室对混合物进行脱气，以补充或代替热固性材料等压力锅。但我的化学知识至少限于这是否安全。</p>; <p>;真空泵是否只需要具有耐溶剂配件和/或无刷电机以防止释放的真空溶剂蒸气着火通过混合物？（显然会存在通风</p>; <p>;同样对于压力罐，我假设发生的任何溶剂蒸发只会持续到空气完全饱和，然后不会发生进一步的蒸发？并且只会释放室内压力时需要确保适当的通风，以避免蒸汽在附近区域积聚？</p>; <p>;PS 中使用的潜在溶剂包括丙酮、甲苯、THF、D-柠檬烯，它们是来自双重固化（紫外线固化或 mekp 催化剂）聚酯热固性树脂，含有苯乙烯单体，或仅含有苯乙烯单体。</p>; <p>;感谢您的宝贵时间。在互联网上的任何地方都找不到类似的答案。感觉如果这是一系列愚蠢的问题，请随意指出我的愚蠢。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176579</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-3</re:rank>; <title type="text">;如何确定蒸馏何时完成？ [关闭]</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="organic-chemistry">;</category>; <author>; <name>;user138028</name>; <uri>; https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138028</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176579/how-can-you-define-when- a-distillation-is-finished" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-30T08:07:14Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-30T08:07:14Z</更新>; <摘要类型="html">; <p>;这是关于简单的蒸馏</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176578</id>; <re: rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;五胺氯钴(III)氯化物的异构体</stitle>; <category schema="https:// Chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="inorganic-chemistry">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="coordination-compounds">;</category>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“isomers”>;</类别>;<作者>;<名称>;Razz</名称>;<uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/ users/137310</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176578/isomers-of-pentaaminechlorocobaltiii-chloride" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023- 09-30T07:29:14Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-30T09:23:48Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;什么样的异构体 <span class="math-容器">;$\ce{[Co(NH3)5Cl]Cl2}$</span>; 展示？</p>; <p>;我可以排除几何和光学，因为存在 <span class="math-container" >;$\ce{5 NH3}$</span>; 配体的中心金属原子不能有不同的 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{Cl}$</span>; 位置，因为只存在一个。 </p>; <p>;这不显示连接异构现象，因为没有二齿或多齿配体，这不显示配位或溶剂异构现象，因为化学式中没有配位第二配合物且没有溶剂</p>; < p>;这是否显示电离异构现象，因为 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{NH3}$</span>; 可以占据 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{Cl 的位置}$</span>; 在前面，我们可以有 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{[Co(NH3)3Cl3](NH3)2}$</span>; 但我面临是否胺可以占据反离子的位置，反离子存在以平衡电荷，而金属的氧化态没有变化，那么这种转变可以自由发生？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; < id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176577</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type="text ">;NMR 中的非均匀采样</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="nmr-spectroscopy">;</category>; <author>; <name>;AChem</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/66245</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176577/non-uniform-sampling -in-nmr" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-30T02:48:48Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-30T04:15:21Z</更新>; <summary type="html ">; <p>;核磁共振波谱中的非均匀采样 (NUS) 是一种先进的数据处理技术，与跨时间点的均匀采样不同，它允许在减少的时间点上采集自由感应衰变 (FID) 数据。整个时域。当均匀采样数据采集所需的时间可能变得相当长时，这种方法特别有利。</p>; <p>;有谁有在大多数 1D NMR 实验中哪种采样方案最好的经验吗？这在 2D 中更流行，但 1D NUS 也可以完成。从 FID 中随机采样数据点可能会选取 FID 的尾部，其中噪声往往占主导地位，而指数采样将存在选择初始点并丢弃后续点的偏差。然而，选择 SNR 高的 FID 区域会有一个优势（如果我们可以这么说的话）。哪种采样方案最适合恢复“真实”数据。 NMR？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176576</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry. stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;为什么速率确定步骤会导致这些不平等关系？</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/标签" term="kinetics">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;wayrese </名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/137130</uri>; </author>; <link href ="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176576/why-does-rate-determining-step-lead-to-these-inequality-relations" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09- 30T01:04:23Z</已发布>; <更新>;2023-09-30T15:37:46Z</更新>; <summary type="html">; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur .com/fFJLo.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/fFJLo.png" alt="在此处输入图像描述" />;</a>; 这里，机制(i)的速率表达式如下：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$$rate = \frac{K_1^2k_2k_3[H^+][A]^2 }{k_{-2}+K_1k_3[A]}$$</span>;</p>; <p>;对于 (ii)，<span class="math-container">;$$rate = \frac{K_1k_2k_3 [H^+][A]^2}{k_{-2}[H^+]+k_3[A]}$$</span>;</p>; <p>;我被要求证明这两个序列当最后一步（即CC键形成）是限速时，它们在动力学上是可区分的。解决方案的关键是最后一步的速率限制导致以下表达式。剩下的只是一些我没有问题的代数计算，但我不明白以下关系是如何从速率确定步骤的信息中得出的。有人可以详细解释一下吗？</p>; <p>;对于 (i)，<span class="math-container">;$$K_1k_3[A] << K_{-2}$$</span>;</p>; <p>;对于 (ii)，<span class="math-container">;$$k_{-2}[H^+] >;>;>; k_3[A]$$</span>;</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176574</id>; <re：排名方案="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-4</re:rank>; <title type="text">;寻找天然粘合剂来替代创可贴[已关闭]</stitle>; <category schema="https ://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="bond">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;黛比</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138016</ uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176574/searching-for-a-natural-adhesive-to-replace-bandaid" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-09-29T22:55:21Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T22:55:21Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;寻找一种自然粘附在皮肤上的材料时间很短（5分钟），但没有胶带的粘性。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176572< /id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;生锈实验的观察结果是什么</stitle>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“实验化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“home-实验">;</类别>; <类别方案="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="process-chemistry">;</类别>; <作者>; <名称>;塔莎</名称>; <uri>; https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138015</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176572/what-are-the-observation-of- the-rusting-experiment" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-29T21:40:40Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-29T21:40:40Z</更新>; <summary type=" html">; <p>;我将油和水放入一个杯子中，另一个杯子中只放入水，没有覆盖任何杯子。我看到指甲上有红棕色涂层，但此后什么也没有，我需要答案，因为这是我的项目。我的老师还说生锈实验要在 7 天内进行，我们应该写下第一天到第七天的观察结果，我很困惑。请帮我。谢谢。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176570</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry .stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;查看或转换未格式化质谱数据的程序</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags " term="software">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="mass-spectrometry">;</category>; <作者>; <name>;JR</name >; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138010</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176570/programs-to-view-或-convert-unformatted-mass-spec-data" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-29T19:02:47Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-30T09:23:02Z</更新>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我以非常简单的格式 .txt 文件获得了质谱数据。每个文件有两列：m/z 和强度。没有标题或任何东西。有没有可以读取该文件的程序？或者如何将其转换为可由 OpenChrom 等程序读取的文件。</p>; <p>;我知道我可以使用 Excel，但我真的很喜欢专用 MS 程序的功能（模拟峰值、缩放等） ）。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176568</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry. stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;有效核心潜力及其“相应的Pople”基础集</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/标签” term=“量子化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“计算化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https： //chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="密度功能理论">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="basis-set">;< /category>; <作者>; <名称>;MrAmateurChem</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138007</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange .com/questions/176568/ effective-core-potials-and-their-corresponding-pople-basis-set" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-09-29T15:57:12Z</已发布>; <已更新>;2023-09-29T15:57:12Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;阅读<a href="http://ursula.chem.yale.edu/%7Ebatista/classes/ tutorials/gaussian/ECP_bases.pdf" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;来自耶鲁大学的讲义</a>;展示了作者将 ECP 与 Pople 基组关联起来。作者说SDD的相应基础集是6-31G，Def2TZV是6-311G，LANL2MB是STO-3G，等等......我对两者之间的相关性感到困惑，因为我认为它们完全不同不能直接相关的 LCAO 集。这些 ECP 之一的一部分是用 Pople 基组构建的吗？还是我误解了？</p>; <p>;方向（出版物、文章等的链接）将不胜感激，以便我可以澄清我的误解并了解这一点，并消除知识上的任何差距。谢谢。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176565</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry .stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;高锰酸钾在哪种介质中是更好的氧化剂？</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com /标签”术语=“无机化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“电化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https：/ /chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="redox">;</category>; <作者>; <name>;thundercrypt</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/133245</uri>; </作者>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176565/in-which-medium-is-potassium-permanganate-a-better-oxys-agent" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2023-09-29T11:47:26Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T12:38:39Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我刚才在上化学课，我的化学老师给了我们三个反应：</p>; <p>;反应 1: <span class="math-container">;$\ce{MnO4^- + e- ->;; + MnO4^2-（基础介质）}$</span>;</p>; <p>;反应2：<span class="math-container">;$\ce{MnO4^- + 4H+ + 3e- ->; + MnO2 + 2H2O（中性或近中性介质）}$</span>;</p>; <p>;反应 3：<span class="math-container">;$\ce{MnO4^- + 8H+ + 5e- - >; + Mn^2+ + 4H2O（酸性介质）}$</span>;</p>; <p>;n 因子为 <span class="math-container">;$n_1=1$</span>;，<分别是span class="math-container">;$n_2=3$</span>;和<span class="math-container">;$n_3=5$</span>;。</p>; <p>;现在，当我的老师说 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{KMnO4}$</span>; 是酸性介质中最好的氧化剂时，问题就出现了。他说这是因为 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{KMnO4}$</span>; 在酸性介质中具有最大的 n 因子。我决定在我的书（NCERT，这是我们在印度使用的标准书）中进行一些事实核查，我发现这些反应中的每一个都具有 <span class="math-container" 的还原潜力>;$E^⦵_1 = +0.56 \mathrm{V}$</span>;、<span class="math-container">;$E^⦵_2 = +1.69 \mathrm{V}$</span>;，以及<span class="math-container">;$E^⦵_3 = +1.52 \mathrm{V}$</span>; 分别，这使我得出结论， <span class="math-container">;$\如果我们根据还原电位的实验数据来看，ce{KMnO4}$</span>;是中性介质中较好的氧化剂。</p>; <p>;除此之外，我的书中还提到：“虽然很多反应可以通过考虑氧化还原电位来理解，反应动力学也是一个重要因素。高锰酸盐位于 <span class="math-container">;$\ce{[H+]}$</span>; <span class="math-container">;$=$</span>; <span class="math-container “$1$</span>; 应该会氧化水，但实际上反应非常缓慢，除非存在锰 (II) 离子或温度升高。”它没有进一步详细说明，但这给了我一个暗示，不知何故，该反应的动力学也很重要。</p>; <p>;我这边的补充：如果我们要计算标准吉布斯自由能根据给定的氧化还原电位，我们会发现第三个反应的吉布斯自由能最负。这无论如何都会产生影响吗？既然它“更自发”，那么在这种情况下我们是否可以认为它是一种更好的氧化剂？</p>; <p>;所以我的最后一个问题是，这本书是正确的还是我的老师是正确的？如果我的老师是正确的，那么我应该如何知道通过还原电位或通过 n 因子来判断氧化性质？看来我的老师更重视化学计量学，而这本书更重视动力学和热力学。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/ q/176564</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-2</re:rank>; <title type="text">;混合不同比例的 NaOH 和 NaOH 时的温度变化H2SO4 溶液</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="acid-base">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/标签" term="thermodynamics">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;Xxxtentacion </名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/138000</uri>; </author>; <link href ="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176564/Temperature-change-when-mixing- Different-ratios-of-naoh-and-h2so4-solutions" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023- 09-29T11:15:22Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T12:54:09Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;相同条件下，混合多少ml 1M < span class="math-container">;$\ce{KOH}$</span>; 溶液和 0​​.5M <span class="math-container">;$\ce{H2SO4}$</span>; 溶液组成总计100ml 的体积会导致温度升高？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176562</id>; <re:rank schema= "https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;了解锌和氢氧化钠反应形成的锌酸钠 (Na2ZnO2) 的成分</stitle>; <类别方案="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="acid-base">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="reaction-mechanism" >;</类别>; <作者>; <名称>;uggupuggu </名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/137781</uri>; </作者>; <link href="https://chemistry .stackexchange.com/questions/176562/understanding-the-composition-of-sodium-zincate-na2zno2-formed-from-zinc-and-s" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-09-29T06:43 :00Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T12:48:38Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我最近进行了一项实验，将锌与氢氧化钠反应形成钠锌酸盐（Na<sub>;2</sub>;ZnO<sub>;2</sub>;）。但是，我无法理解为什么锌酸钠的成分为 Na<sub>;2</sub>;ZnO<sub>;2</sub>;。有人可以解释导致这种特定成分的化学反应和原理吗？此外，哪些因素影响该反应的化学计量，以及它与锌酸钠的性质有何关系？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com /q/176554</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;0</re:rank>; <title type="text">;为什么离子化合物的样品会分解成碎片，但这些片段不会再次组合成更大的样本？</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="ions">;</category>; <category schema="https: //chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="ionic-compounds">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;鲍勃</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/137186​​< /uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176554/why-do-samples-of-ionic-compounds-break-into-pieces-but-the-pieces- do-not-combi" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-29T01:18:16Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-29T16:29:05Z</更新>; <summary type=" html">; <p>;离子化合物的一个独特特性是它们很脆。我们得知这是因为当对晶格施加力时，离子会移动，导致正离子排斥正离子，负离子排斥负离子。结果，晶格破碎。因此离子化合物是脆性的。对我来说这是合乎逻辑的。</p>; <p>;但是，使用类似的直觉，我们是否也可以将破碎的碎片重新组合在一起。在某些时候，我们应该让带相反电荷的离子对齐，从而使破碎的碎片再次聚集在一起。显然，当我们把食盐放在一起时，它们不会再聚在一起。那么我的直觉从根本上来说有什么问题吗？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176552</id>; <re:rank schema ="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;测量原子内电子、质子和中子的数量</stitle>; <category schema=" https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="电子">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="atoms">;</category>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“质子”>;</类别>;<类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“中子”>;< /category>; <作者>; <名称>;doca</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/137982</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange .com/questions/176552/measurement-of-the-number-of-electrons-protons-and-neutrons-inside-an-atom" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-09-28T22:32:15Z </published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T04:49:16Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我们如何测量原子内质子、电子和中子的数量？例如，可以进行哪些实验来确定铁原子包含 26 个质子？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176550 </id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;变性和天然蛋白质的迁移率</stitle>; <category方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“生物化学”>;</类别>;<作者>;<名称>;Jaehyun Ahn</名称>;<uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/用户/72807</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176550/denatured-and-native- Proteins-migration-rate" rel="alternate"/>; < Publication>;2023-09-28T21:08:56Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T21:58:28Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;变性蛋白质的迁移速度总是比原生蛋白质慢吗蛋白质？</p>; <p>;我想知道如果蛋白质没有变性，折叠会如何影响凝胶过滤过程中的迁移速率。</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https: //chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176549</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;-5</re:rank>; <title type="text">;什么是我用 KNO3 在水中制作的东西吗？</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="electrochemistry">;</category>; <category schema="https: //chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="电解">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;布鲁诺·里埃拉</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/137957</ uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176549/what-is-the-thing-i-made-in-water-with-kno3-i-made" rel ="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-28T21:05:00Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-29T10:53:44Z</更新>; <summary type="html">; <p>;所以我尝试用<strong>;水和硝酸钾</strong>;电解（用于园艺，所以不是最纯净的东西）我在谷歌中看到的反应说它会分解成氧气和氢气，但这可能是用石墨电极，但是我用了<strong>;铁钉</strong>;，电解后有<strong>;白色微固体，不溶于水</strong>;沉在烧瓶底部，任何人都知道它是什么？ </p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176548</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange .com">;2</re:rank>; <title type="text">;解释以下反应的机理，该反应涉及双构型反转的 1,2-烷基迁移</stitle>; <category schema=" https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="organic-chemistry">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="reaction-mechanism">;< /类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“立体化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“水解">;</类别>; <类别方案="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="rearrangements">;</类别>; <作者>; <名称>;环丙醇</名称>; <uri>;https： //chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/113430</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/176548/explain-the-mechanism-of-the-following-反应-其中-涉及-a-1-2-烷基-migr" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-28T19:22:48Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-29T06:35： 38Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我遇到了以下反应，据说其机制涉及构型双反转的 1,2-烷基迁移。使用的试剂是亚硝酸（原位生成），然后进行酸性水解。</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/AzRtg.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer" >;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/AzRtg.png" alt="在此处输入图像描述" />;</a>;</p>; <p>;我得到一个提示，第一个步骤涉及亚硝酸与NH基团的反应。但是，我无法理解反应是如何进行的。谁能解释一下这个机制吗？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176542</id>; <re:rank schema="https: //chemistry.stackexchange.com">;2</re:rank>; <title type="text">;对于酸度来说，大小和电负性哪个更重要？</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange. com/tags" term="organic-chemistry">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="acid-base">;</category>; <category schema=" https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="resonance">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="Hydrogen">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;Max0815 </名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/74326</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions /176542/is-size-or-electricnegativity-more-important-in-acidity" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2023-09-28T17:12:12Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09-29T03 :13:36Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;对于下面的分子，是含氧的氢的酸性更强还是含硫的分子更酸性？</p>; <p>;<a href ="https://i.stack.imgur.com/wYckq.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/wYckq.png" alt="Enter图像描述在这里” />;</a>;</p>; <p>;由于两个部分具有相同数量的共振结构，我猜这只是归结为原子的电负性或大小是否优先决定是否质子的酸性更强。</p>; <p>;那么，在酸性中，大小和电负性哪个更重要？</p>; <p>;提前致谢！</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/176531</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type=" text">;是什么使苯环上的质子转变为更低的 ppm？</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="organic-chemistry">;</category>; <category schema ="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="spectroscopy">;</category>; <类别方案="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="nmr-spectroscopy">;< /category>; <作者>; <名称>;ilovecats </名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/137959</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange .com/questions/176531/what-shifts-protons-on-a-苯环-to-lower-ppm" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-09-28T02:15:54Z</已发布>; <updated>;2023-09-28T20:13:35Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;为什么这些质子出现在 6.9 和 6.93 ppm 处，<strong>;ppm 值</strong>;较低？我认为这是由于各向异性效应，特别是我认为循环的 (pi) 电子感应了一个磁场，导致它们经历更强的净磁场，而那些较低的净磁场则不受感应磁场的影响。这显然是由于共振造成的。怎么会是共振呢？电子循环（环电流）是否不会影响所有质子，或者共振是某些质子比其他质子低的主要原因？</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur. com/xSfio.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/xSfio.png" alt="Anisole" />;</a>;</p>; < /summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/172397</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;0< /re:rank>; <title type="text">;非恒定压力和温度过程 - 吉布斯能量作为平衡条件</stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="热力学">;</类别>; <作者>; <名称>;Aurelius611 </名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/132534</uri>; </作者>; <link href="https:// /chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/172397/non-constant-Pressure-and-Temperature-processes-gibbs-energy-as-equilibrium-co" rel="alternate"/>; <已发布>;2023-03-25T13:24 :10Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T03:18:47Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我已经查看了几个问题，但除了以下内容之外，没有一个解决相同的问题：< /p>; <p>;<a href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/127834/is-gibbs-energy-minimized-for-processes-at-constant-Temperature-are-Pressure-onl">;仅在恒温和压力下的过程中吉布斯能量是否最小化？</a>;</p>; <p>;然而，这个问题直到今天仍然没有答案。下面的推导和方程来自 Robin Smith 的《化学工艺设计》（第 5 章）和 Kolt 的《化学热力学》（第 6 章和第 7 章）</p>; <hr />; <p>;对于平衡常数的计算，情况是<span class="math-container">;$\Delta G$</span>; 在平衡条件下设置为零。然而，据我所知，这样做似乎不合适，我想知道我做错了什么。</p>; <p>;我正在考虑理想气体的反应，其中总压力在反应进行时发生变化。随着反应的进行，吉布斯能可以用以下正确的方程描述：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$\Delta G_{rxn} = \Delta G - \Delta G^0 =RT\ln{K}$</span>;</p>; <p>;但是，据称在平衡状态下<span class="math-container">;$\Delta G = 0$</span>;。因此，</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$\Delta G^0=-RT\ln{K_{eq}}$</span>;</p>; <p>;后者方程是我关心的一个，因为强制要求 <span class="math-container">;$\Delta G = 0$</span>;，这似乎不合适，因为反应进行时压力正在变化。我的担忧源于下面详述的逻辑。</p>; <hr />; <hr />; <hr />; <p>;平衡的标准热力学条件是 <span class="math-container">;$dS_{tot} = 0$</span>;。然后，这可以导致涉及吉布斯能量的平衡条件，如下所示：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$dS_{total} = dS_{env}+dS_{sys}$</span >;</p>; <p>;根据系统变量重写平衡条件仅给出：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$dS_{sys} = \frac{DQ_{ sys}}{T_{sys}} $</span>;</p>; <p>;这假设 <span class="math-container">;$T_{env} = T_{sys}$</span>;</ p>; <p>;嵌入热力学第一定律并假设仅 PV 功留给我们：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$dU+Pdv - TdS = 0$</span>; </p>; <p>;施加恒定温度和压力的假设允许添加 P 和 T 差异，因为它们为零。</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$dU+PdV + VdP - TdS - SdT = 0$</span>;</p>; <p>;积分后，得出：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$\Delta U + \Delta (PV) - T\Delta S = 0 $</span>;</p>; <p>;或同等</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$\Delta H - T \Delta S = 0$ </span>; 与 <span class="math-container">;$\Delta G = \Delta H - T \Delta S$</span>;</p>; <p>;然而，这个最终结果只是与假设 <span class="math-container">;$dP$</span>; 和 <span class="math-container">;$dT$</span>; 为零。如果去掉这个假设，平衡条件微分将如下：</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$dU+Pdv + VdP - TdS - SdT = -VdP - SdT$</ span>;</p>; <p>;或</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$dG = VdP - SdT$</span>;</p>; <p>;后一个方程不产生<span class="math-container">;$\Delta G = 0$</span>;。事实上，<span class="math-container">;$\Delta G$</span>;和<span class="math-container">;$K$</span>;关系就是从中导出的。最终结果是我们同时对同一系统应用一个恒压方程和另一个非恒压方程；这对我来说没有意义，因为压力要么恒定，要么不恒定。</p>; <p>;那 <span class="math-container">;$\Delta G^0=-RT\ln{ 是怎么回事？ K_{eq}}$</span>;？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/169767</id>; <re:rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;表明如果 H 是埃尔米特式的，则 <Ψ|H|Φ>; = <HΨ|Φ>; </stitle>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="quantum-chemistry">;</category>; <作者>; <name>;Bartholomew696969</name>; <uri>;https:// /chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/122634</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/169767/show-that-if-h-is-hermitian-then -%ce%a8h%ce%a6-h%ce%a8%ce%a6" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2022-12-07T01:29:05Z</发布>; <更新>;2023-09- 30T08:44:51Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;由于 H 是埃尔米特式的，所以它等于它的复共轭（如下所示），这是我用来证明的属性：</p >; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/409uF.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/409uF .png" alt="it" />;</a>;</p>; <p>;我必须证明 <Ψ|H|Φ>; = <HΨ|Φ>，我的做法如下：</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/mGOgM.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;< img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/mGOgM.png" alt="在此处输入图像描述" />;</a>;</p>; <p>;我的问题是我的证明是否有效 -因为粉色位彼此相等，所以这两件事相等吗？</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/169692</id>; <re :rank schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;5</re:rank>; <title type="text">;胆固醇的 Salkowski 反应机制是什么？</stitle>; <category schema=" https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="organic-chemistry">;</category>; <category schema="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="reaction-mechanism">;< /类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语=“分析化学”>;</类别>; <类别方案=“https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags”术语="lipids">;</category>; <作者>; <名称>;环丙醇</名称>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/113430</uri>; </author>; <link href="https ://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/169692/what-is-the-mechanism-of-salkowski-reaction-of-%d1%81holesterols" rel="alternate"/>; <发布>;2022-12-03T12： 46:17Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T11:05:34Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;我最近遇到了胆固醇的索尔科斯基反应。用浓硫酸处理氯仿中的胆固醇。 A positive test exhibits two distinct layers, the upper chloroform layer gets a red to violet colour, while the lower sulfuric acid layer exhibits a greenish glow.</p>; <ol>; <li>;<p>;The chemistry behind the reaction is dehydration using <span class="math-container">;$\ce{H2SO4},$</span>; forming cholestadiene.</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/jyI4s.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/jyI4s.png" alt="dehydration of сholesterol" />;</a>;</p>; </li>; <li>;<p>;In the second step, the cholestadiene undergoes dimerization.</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/HOZXc.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/HOZXc.png" alt="dimerization of cholestadiene" />;</a>;</p>; </li>; <li>;<p>;In the last step, the cholestadiene undergoes sulfonation at the 7,7' position. (I believe I drew the correct structure)</p>; <p>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/ojs82.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/ojs82.png" alt="sulfonation of cholestadiene" />;</a>;</p>; </li>; </ol>; <p>;However, I couldn't find a <em>;valid mechanism</em>; for the second and the third steps (dimerization and sulfonation). Can someone explain the mechanism?</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/164022</id>; <re:rank scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;3</re:rank>; <title type="text">;How can the reaction heat be ignored in an energy balance?</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="physical-chemistry">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="kinetics">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="heat">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="chemical-engineering">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="process-chemistry">;</category>; <author>; <name>;J Faller</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/122755</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/164022/how-can-the-reaction-heat-be-ignored-in-an-energy-balance" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2022-03-26T10:37:21Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-30T00:04:50Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;I have received from my professor the following (summarized) problem:</p>; <p>;A first-order exothermic reaction <span class="math-container">;$\ce{A->B}$</span>; took place in a typical tubular plug flow reactor (PFR). The tube was cooled to a constant wall temperature <span class="math-container">;$T_\mathrm{w}$</span>; and the total amount of heat removed from the reactor <span class="math-container">;$Q$</span>; was given in Watts. All needed constants and geometrical parameters and <span class="math-container">;$T_\text{inlet}$</span>; and <span class="math-container">;$T_\text{outlet}$</span>; were provided.</p>; <p>;The goal was to find the (constant) value of the wall temperature <span class="math-container">;$T_\mathrm{w}$</span>; that ensures heat <span class="math-container">;$Q$</span>; is being removed from the reactor.</p>; <p>;My question is not about the final value but rather the logical aspects. In my professor's solution, they simply used the following formula from a heat exchanger:</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$$ Q = U \times A \times LMTD $$</span>;</p>; <p>;where <span class="math-container">;$LMTD$</span>; is the logarithmic mean temperature difference based on <span class="math-container">;$T_\text{inlet}$</span>;, <span class="math-container">;$T_\text{outlet}$</span>; and <span class="math-container">;$T_w$</span>; (to be determined). <span class="math-container">;$Q$</span>;, <span class="math-container">;$U$</span>; and <span class="math-container">;$A$</span>; are given.</p>; <p>;This approach makes sense for a tubular heat exchanger but as soon as a reaction is happening inside the inner duct, the energy balance doesn't result in the <span class="math-container">;$LMTD$</span>; anymore. The PFR heat balance in this scenario is:</p>; <p>;<span class="math-container">;$$\frac{\mathrm{d}T}{\mathrm{d}z} = \frac{k_{W}}{u\rho c_P}\frac{4}{D}\left(T_\mathrm{w}-T\right)+\frac{r(-\Delta_R H)}{u\rho c_P}$$</span>;</p>; <p>;If the reaction were non-existing (<span class="math-container">;$r=0$</span>;), one could derive the <span class="math-container">;$LMTD$</span>; approach to solving this from the balance above. But that's not the case.</p>; <p>;What do you think? Given <span class="math-container">;$Q$</span>; (along the entire reactor), <span class="math-container">;$T_\text{inlet}$</span>;, <span class="math-container">;$T_\text{outlet}$</span>; and all other constants/parameter, can you calculate <span class="math-container">;$T_\mathrm{w}$</span>;? Is my professor's approach correct? If so, how can one derive this formula from the energy balance as one does for a simple heat exchanger?</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/103009</id>; <re:rank scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;Lattice energy of NaCl and MgCl [sic]</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="physical-chemistry">;</category>; <author>; <name>;Devansh Shah</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/69039</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/103009/lattice-energy-of-nacl-and-mgcl-sic" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2018-10-16T03:26:25Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T21:50:07Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;In an exam paper it says that the lattice energy of NaCl is more exothermic than MgCl [sic] as the Na+ cation has a smaller ionic radius than Mg+. Here are the resources given:<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/UbLiG.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/UbLiG.png" alt="enter image description here" />;</a>;<a href="https://i.stack.imgur.com/Svsge.png" rel="nofollow noreferrer">;<img src="https://i.stack.imgur.com/Svsge.png" alt="enter image description here" />;</a>;</p>; <p>;What is the reasoning for for Na+ having a smaller ionic radius even though Mg+ has a higher proton number?</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/72501</id>; <re:rank scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;1</re:rank>; <title type="text">;Why isn't mercury electrode used to produce commercial element sodium?</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="aqueous-solution">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="electrolysis">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="metallurgy">;</category>; <author>; <name>;Pritt says Reinstate Monica</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/42741</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/72501/why-isnt-mercury-electrode-used-to-produce-commercial-element-sodium" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2017-04-13T10:25:16Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-30T09:37:37Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;I know that while electrolysing a solution of brine, if we use mercury cathode, we get sodium amalgam instead of having hydrogen gas liberated. Even the <em>;Castner-Kellner</em>; process uses this to produce sodium hydroxide.</p>; <p>;However, wouldn't the mercury electrodes be used to produce commercial elemental sodium? I feel it's much easier to electrolyse aqueous NaCl than to melt NaCl. Then why don't they use aqueous NaCl decomposition with mercury cathode to get Na metal?</p>; <p>;Edit: Its seems even more topsy-turvy now. Regular electrolysis of Brine itself produces NaOH, then why bother with the mercury? </p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/31312</id>; <re:rank scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;6</re:rank>; <title type="text">;What is the Ksp of Al(OH)3?</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="solubility">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="reference-request">;</category>; <author>; <name>;Dexter</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/16177</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/31312/what-is-the-ksp-of-aloh3" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2015-05-13T10:49:04Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-30T14:49:35Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;Top hits on google are: </p>; <p>;<a href="http://bilbo.chm.uri.edu/CHM112/tables/KspTable.htm" rel="nofollow">;This site</a>;<br>; Aluminum hydroxide $\ce{Al(OH)_3}$ >;>; $ 1.3×10^{–33}$</p>; <p>;and</p>; <p>;<a href="http://www4.ncsu.edu/~franzen/public_html/CH201/data/Solubility_Product_Constants.pdf" rel="nofollow">;This site</a>;<br>; Aluminum hydroxide $\ce{Al(OH)_3}$ >;>; $ 3×10^{–34}$ </p>; <p>;which is one order of magnitude different.</p>; <p>;What can be the reason for this variation? Experimental conditions? Where can I get accurate or reliable results/data of $K_{\mathrm{sp}}$ in general? </p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/24769</id>; <re:rank scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;8</re:rank>; <title type="text">;Why Ca 2+ and not Ca +2</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="nomenclature">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="ions">;</category>; <author>; <name>;Simon-Nail-It</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/9757</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/24769/why-ca-2-and-not-ca-2" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2015-02-07T10:35:09Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T12:47:23Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;I have been learning chemistry for a year or two but I still can't understand this. According to maths we should place the plus or minus sign in front of a number like -2. However, In chemistry we always put the sign behind a number when writing ions like $\ce{Ba^2+}$ ,$\ce{Cu^2+}$, $\ce{O^2-}$ etc. So, I want to know why do we write it that way?</p>; </summary>; </entry>; <entry>; <id>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/q/13802</id>; <re:rank scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com">;3</re:rank>; <title type="text">;I heard aluminium doesn't produce fumes when burnt but the opposite happened, how?</stitle>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="safety">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="metal">;</category>; <category scheme="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/tags" term="combustion">;</category>; <author>; <name>;Random kid</name>; <uri>;https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/users/6911</uri>; </author>; <link href="https://chemistry.stackexchange.com/questions/13802/i-heard-aluminium-doesnt-produce-fumes-when-burnt-but-the-opposite-happened-ho" rel="alternate"/>; <published>;2014-06-22T10:26:02Z</published>; <updated>;2023-09-29T02:20:18Z</updated>; <summary type="html">; <p>;One day I took aluminium foil(sanitary brand, don't know if you've heard it) then I casually burned it over a gas lighter then it burned and gave off Grey fumes and the foil became a dull Grey where it had burnt. I mistakenly may have inhaled a bit of fumes. I had a slight pain in my right nostril the whole day.那个怎么样？ Is that dangerous? </p>; </summary>; </entry>; </feed>;
